name: Lilium Of The Fallen Angel
description:
A Bullet Hell game with a touch of inspiration taken from the famed Touhou series. A weeb trash filled with fun memes (in our opinion it's funny), yet we try to spend each and every ounce of our strength refining it, creating a desired high-production game even though we've just known the game dev for mere weeks. It has become a passion project rather than merely a submission for a game dev competition, and we aim to perfect it for that cause.

https://youtu.be/GM_lDHKkHYY
